resume_content:
Oleksandr Kryvonosov
Palm Harbor, FL
okrishka@gmail.com
7273868416
Skills: Java 8, C/C++, C#, SQL, PL/SQL, XSLT, Oracle, Servlets, JSP, Spring Framework, Web services,
Kafka, Gemfire, Hazelcast, Redis, Apache Flink, JUnit, Mockito, Linux/Unix shell scripts, design patterns
Authorized to work in the US for any employer
Work Experience
Java Developer eTrading
Citibank - Tampa, FL
July 2018 to Present
Working as an independent contractor in Citi Credit eTrading platform. Developing multithreaded high-
throughput microservices applications using Java 8, Spring Integration, LMAX Disruptor, Gemfire,
Hazelcast, Redis, Kafka, TIBCO EMS, Apache Flink, Docker
Software Developer
SCC SoftComputer - Clearwater, FL
November 2008 to July 2018
Working as programmer in Healthcare domain. Developing information systems for laboratories and
blood banks. 
Responsibilities: 
* Experience working as part of a large multi-region team 
* Participated in Design, Development and support phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
* Experience in building SOAP and RESTful web services 
* Used and implemented the application using Spring modules and Hibernate. 
* Used Spring Core for dependency injection/Inversion of Control (IoC). 
* Implemented spring configuration files for the beans defined and properties to be injected into them
using Spring Dependency Injection. 
* Proficient in writing SQL queries, PL/SQL, functions and Stored Procedures. 
* Worked with Oracle RDBMS, including but not limited to data export-import 
* Worked on Java Multithreading and Collections. 
* Experience with Hadoop, Apache Spark 
* Hands on Docker 
* C/C++ 
* Experience in development of application components using technologies such as JSP, Servlets,
Expression Language, jQuery, JavaScript, Json. 
* Utilized AJAX to increase web page interactivity, speed and functionality. 
* Used Eclipse as an IDE for code development. 
* Used XSLT to create XML transformations 
* Utilized Junit, Spring Test DbUnit, Mockito, Java Reflection API for unit testing 
* Used various Java, J2EE design patterns like singleton, builder, strategy etc. 
* Used ANT and Maven for project build. 
* C# Windows Forms Application using Visual Studio 
* Used Log4j and Logback for logging 
* Experience in Shell scripting to perform debugging tasks on Unix environment 
* Experience in Perl scripting to perform various tasks on Unix environment 
* Used SVN, Bitbucket for version control
Software Programmer
Informational system development - Dnipro
March 2003 to November 2008
Responsibilities: 
- Coding (C/C++, PL/SQL, XSLT) 
- Analyzing, debugging, fixing coding problems 
- Troubleshooting support issues 
- Designing new software components
Education
Master's in Computer Science
National Mining University - Dnipro
September 1996 to June 2001
Skills
Spring (3 years), Java (7 years), C# (2 years), Perl (3 years), C (10+ years), JPA (3 years), C++ (1 year),
PL/SQL (6 years), Hibernate (1 year), Rest
